body:
Comment 5 by **bellermike**: 
So many of the other tests in this file will not work on non-Unix systems.  They refer
to /etc/passwd, etc.  Still it can't hurt to use TempDir.  But I do want to point out
that, /tmp is already used directly here:
http://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/pkg/os/os_test.go?r=release#388  So if
someone wants to make that change it would make sense to make it in both places.  In any
case my original patch should fix the problem without adding any new non-portability.
